analysis.description:
VanityCrowdsale.registerParticipant (/unique_contracts/0x111111150b873d4bc367c41f39325c01a7263ac5.sol#488-505) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(registeredInDay[msg.sender] == 0)

Reentrancy in VanityCrowdsale.distribute (/unique_contracts/0x111111150b873d4bc367c41f39325c01a7263ac5.sol#527-541):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(ownerWallet,ownerTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x111111150b873d4bc367c41f39325c01a7263ac5.sol)
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x111111150b873d4bc367c41f39325c01a7263ac5.sol)
	- token.unpause() (/unique_contracts/0x111111150b873d4bc367c41f39325c01a7263ac5.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- distributed (/unique_contracts/0x111111150b873d4bc367c41f39325c01a7263ac5.sol)

VanityCrowdsale.distribute (/unique_contracts/0x111111150b873d4bc367c41f39325c01a7263ac5.sol#527-541) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(participant,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x111111150b873d4bc367c41f39325c01a7263ac5.sol)
	-token.mint(ownerWallet,ownerTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x111111150b873d4bc367c41f39325c01a7263ac5.sol)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x111111150b873d4bc367c41f39325c01a7263ac5.sol)

VanityCrowdsale.distribute has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.mint(participant,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x111111150b873d4bc367c41f39325c01a7263ac5.sol)

Reentrancy in VanityCrowdsale.distribute (/unique_contracts/0x111111150b873d4bc367c41f39325c01a7263ac5.sol#527-541):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(participant,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x111111150b873d4bc367c41f39325c01a7263ac5.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- distributedTokens (/unique_contracts/0x111111150b873d4bc367c41f39325c01a7263ac5.sol)
